circumstances: After a night takeoff at Madison Airport, the twin engine airplane encountered difficulties to gain height when it struck tree tops and crashed in a wooded area. The aircraft was destroyed and both pilots were killed.
probable_cause:
Collision with trees after the crew misjudged altitude and clearance. The following contributing factors were reported:
- High obstructions, 
- Hi trees 50 feet AGL on runway heading, 2,300 feet from runway end,
- Landing gear in transit.
